A.name: Archway press
A.method: Use a big archway to do wide stretches.

a.name: The Anvil
a.method: Use the ottoman to stretch the upper back.

b.name: Elastic bands
b.method: Stretch out the shoulders, arms, and back & maybe do the Jetpack.

c.name: Counter steps
c.method: Stretch out the hips, psoas & glutes by stepping onto a counter.

d.name: Doorframe yoga
d.method: Use a doorframe to stretch the arms & chest.

e.name: Elevations
e.method: Hold yourself between the counters for as long as you can.

f.name: Fireplace yoga
f.method: Use the facets of the fireplace to stretch the back & shoulders.

h.name: Hand grippers
h.method: Strong hands make guitar and climbing easier.

j.name: Jewel stretch
j.method: Try vertical, horizontal & unassisted to target the mid back.

o.name: Orb harnessing
o.method: Leverage the power of Orb Theory to master the physical body.

p.name: Planks
p.method: Use the foam roller, an ottoman, armchair, or the floor.

P.name: Push-ups
P.method: Use good technique and do as many as you can.

r.name: Foam roller
r.method: Relax on the roller & do some stretches.

S.name: Side bends
S.method: Take the time to do them slowly and hold for a bit.

s.name: Squats
s.method: Use good technique. Do 3 sets of 10.

W.name: Big weights
W.method: Take care to use good technique. Do 3 sets.

w.name: Small weights
w.method: Do as many reps of various types of lift as you can.

x.name: Reflexology mat
x.method: Relax with the foot mat & do ankle-strengthening too.

z.name: Edge twists
z.method: Use the edge of the shower for shoulder & side stretches.
